Class QueryDB

java.lang.Object
QueryDB
public class QueryDB extends Object
Allows for the retrieval of data from the database. This is done through a series of queries which read data from the terminal parameters (only done if needed). It also uses terminal parameters to determine which query is going to be retrieved

  • Method Details

    • executeQuery1

      public static ResultSet executeQuery1() throws ClassNotFoundException, SQLException
      Runs a query which contains all the names of all the movies in the database
      Returns:
      a result set that contains all the names of all the movies in the database
      Throws:
      ClassNotFoundException - if the drivers are not loaded
      SQLException - if there is a problem with the SQL Code

    • executeQuery2

      public static ResultSet executeQuery2(String movie) throws ClassNotFoundException, SQLException
      Runs a query which contains the names of the actors who perform in some specific movie inputted through the command line arguments
      Returns:
      a result set that contains the names of the actors who perform in some specific movie inputted through the command line arguments
      Throws:
      ClassNotFoundException - if the drivers are not loaded
      SQLException - if there is a problem with the SQL Code

    • executeQuery3

      public static ResultSet executeQuery3(String actor, String director) throws SQLException, ClassNotFoundException
      Runs a query which contains the synopses of a movie with a specified actor in it and directed by some particular director.
      Returns:
      a result set that contains the synopses of a movie with a specified actor in it and directed by some particular director. The actor and director are inputted using the command line arguments.
      Throws:
      ClassNotFoundException - if the drivers are not loaded
      SQLException - if there is a problem with the SQL Code

    • executeQuery4

      public static ResultSet executeQuery4(String actor) throws SQLException, ClassNotFoundException
      Runs a query which contains the directors of the movies that have a particular actor in them.
      Returns:
      a result set that contains the directors of the movies that have a particular actor in them. The actor is inputted using the command line arguments.
      Throws:
      ClassNotFoundException - if the drivers are not loaded
      SQLException - if there is a problem with the SQL Code

    • executeQuery5

      public static ResultSet executeQuery5(String genre) throws SQLException, ClassNotFoundException
      Runs a query which contains the movies directed by a director with more than three movies directed, who also have a critic from Rotten Tomatoes better than 4 and have been released in a particular year, while also matching with a particular genre. This is returned in alphabetical order
      Returns:
      a result set that contains the movies directed by a director with more than three movies directed, who also have a critic from Rotten Tomatoes better than 4 while also matching with a particular genre.
      Throws:
      ClassNotFoundException - if the drivers are not loaded
      SQLException - if there is a problem with the SQL Code

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)

    • printer

      public static void printer(ResultSet set) throws SQLException
      Prints the results of the queries in a human-readable way. It first indicates the entry number (in order of printing, it is not the actual entry number of the table) and then the column name with its respective value
      Parameters:
      set - the result set returned by the appropriate query
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an SQL Code error

    • querying

      public static void querying(String[] array) throws SQLException, ClassNotFoundException
      Based on the values of elements inside the array, it runs certain queries. Using those elements, it also fills out the values for queries that require input such as queries 2,3,4 and 5
      Parameters:
      array - can handle any array, but ideally it is going to be used for the Args[] array of the main method
      Throws:
      SQLException
      ClassNotFoundException

    • resultSetChecker

      public static boolean resultSetChecker(ResultSet rs) throws SQLException
      Makes sure that the retrieved result set is not empty. This code was sourced from: //...
      Parameters:
      rs - the result set given by any of the queries
      Returns:
      true if it's not empty and false if it is
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is a problem with the SQL Code

    • executeQuery6

      public static ResultSet executeQuery6() throws SQLException, ClassNotFoundException

      Retrieves the average age of winners of all of the awards that can be won by an actor

      Returns:
      a result set object containing average age of winners of all of the awards that can be won by an actor
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there are any issues with the database
      ClassNotFoundException - if the drivers have not been loaded
